title: Jordan May Execute Would-Be Bomber After ISIS Kills Pilot
teaser: Audie Cornish speaks with Daoud Kuttab, director of Radio al Balad in Amman, Jordan. He talks about how Jordanians are reacting to the death of Jordanian pilot Lt. Muath al-Kasaesbeh.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
